citations.narrative:
There are accumulations of wet shavings and debris by the automatic water valves inside the PVC drainpipes. The
accumulation of wet shavings and debris around the water valves can expose the guinea pigs to potential disease risks.
Water receptacles such as automatic delivery lines must be cleaned and sanitized whenever dirty. In addition, the water
receptacles must be sanitized at least once every 2 weeks. Inadequate cleaning of the automatic water valves and PVC
drainpipes can result in contamination of the guinea pigs in the same enclosure and located in lower enclosures from
those above. Correct by August 1, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.30 
   
Watering. 
There are accumulations of wet shavings and debris by the automatic water valves inside the PVC drainpipes. The 
accumulation of wet shavings and debris around the water valves can expose the guinea pigs to potential disease risks. 
Water receptacles such as automatic delivery lines must be cleaned and sanitized whenever dirty. In addition, the water 
receptacles must be sanitized at least once every 2 weeks. Inadequate cleaning of the automatic water valves and PVC 
drainpipes can result in contamination of the guinea pigs in the same enclosure and located in lower enclosures from 
those above. Correct by August 1, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
